185468432.review:
The Steam Clown Award is an absolutely stupid concept. It serves no real purpose other than to belittle and shame people, offering no constructive value whatsoever. Instead of encouraging positive feedback or meaningful critique, it just reinforces a culture of mockery and pointless trolling. The whole idea is absurd—it’s not even a genuine award, just a ridiculous label meant to humiliate. The fact that it’s even taken seriously by some people is baffling, as it contributes nothing but negativity. In a space where feedback and improvement should be prioritized, the Steam Clown Award is just a senseless, juvenile distraction that serves no beneficial function.

184993357.review:
When you find out that you’ll have to use DirectX 9 to get the game going (and other possible tweaks), you will have the time of your life.

Once upon a time, games were consistently like this where you can tell the developers had fun and poured loads of creativity into a game to keep the player engaged. I find myself constantly getting sidetracked from the main story as there are loads of side missions that will gain you cash and respect that you can use for your upgrades. Most missions are different and will often offer different challenges and environments to keep you guessing. The missions are never long, and the game is easy to pop in and out of. 

You can customize your character, gang, weapons, vehicles, and abilities for those of you who find enjoyment in an easy grind for upgrades. I just recommend the damn game.

184952779.review: bruh solo lo recomiendo en caso de que lo jugaste en la 360

184949787.review:
Saints Row: The Third - это экшен с открытым миром, напоминающий GTA, но с упором на абсурд и безудержное веселье. Сюжет рассказывает о банде Святых, которая борется за контроль над городом Стилпорт. Игра полна юмора, абсурдных ситуаций и взрывного экшена. 
Играть можно как в одиночку, так и по сети, что делает прохождение ещё более весёлым. Вас ждут открытый мир, безумные миссии, необычное оружие и экзотический транспорт. Графика хоть и не топовая, но стильная и яркая, что добавляет шарма игре. 
Игра короткая, но очень насыщенная. Очень советую поиграть в этот шедевр.

184924552.review:
An absolute masterpiece of a game!


Developers, testers, designers, artists, writers, composers have come together to create a product, that I am proud to call not just a product, but a True Game in every sense of the word. This is how a game made out of love looks and feels!

There's already much more complex reviews out there than mine, in video or text format, which underline every aspect of the game, ranging from the development process to deep analyses on story and gameplay, however I cannot but mention some opinions of my own. 

The humour is completely over the top, in the most positive way possible, and the absurdity of the events portrayed is simply hilarious, plenty of times managing to get chuckles out of the player. Of course that these are characteristics that define the entire franchise, but the third installment took it into a more unrealistic approach and I think it was the best of choices, this is exactly what the series needed, a breath of fresh air and relaxation; but I can totally understand the people who would've wanted the series to move in a more realistic direction too, all the while keeping the exaggeration, and I do think that is what the sequel should have done, transition progressively and combine both depictions. Because what is too much after all is, indeed, too much and that is why this series ends with this game for me. 

I also found the writing to be pretty good and the gameplay satisfying. And it is surprisingly stable as well, so thorough testing has been performed, for which I am proud of, but of course, nothing is perfect...

It is also one of my childhood games, I was 9 when I first played Saints Row 3 at launch, and I must admit that some scenes made no sense to me as a child and so it was both funny and nostalgic to get through this game and actually finish it this time.

Thank you for reading!


An absolute masterpiece of a game!

la verdad muy entretenido, 
el primer saint rows que juego.

los puntos que mas me gustaron:
todo lo relacionado a los autos.
la conduccion. la personazalizacion y la cantidad de autos, buenisimo.
el humor y la personalizacion de tu personaje.
la ropa, la voz y el cuerpo, se pueden personalizar bastante.

la historia: no hay un villano principal. solo un monton de tipos secundarios que van apareciendo y desapareciendo cuando se termina su historia. 
los minijuegos y los objetos coleccionables no me motivan mucho para completar el juego 100%

lo que no me gusto:

!!!!!)

le doy un 7.5/10 a este juego.

184852765.review:
The game is a lot of fun, but unfortunately I had a problem with the save that made me lose hours of progress and give up playing.

Yesterday I tried to save the game manually, but the save had the same name, percentage and time as the previous save. I tried to save a few more times to see if it would update, but it didn't change. I thought it was a visual bug and closed the game.

Today I loaded the game normally, I believe thanks to the autosave. After a few hours of playing I went to save to exit the game. The same problem that had occurred the day before happened, I tried to save manually twice and closed the game.

Later I decided to reopen the game and continue my progress, but when I entered the game, it loaded my third-to-last save. By the time I finally realized what had happened, the game had already autosaved and I lost everything.

I researched negative reviews from previous years and found other similar isolated cases. It seems like it's something that happens to few people and I was unlucky enough for it to happen to me too.

184365142.review:
War mein Einstiegstitel der Saints Row Reihe und habe es damals echt gefeiert.
War vor allem von GTA kommend zunächst etwas abstrus und hart an der Grenze zu "zu abgedreht", hat die Balance aber für mich gerade so gehalten.
Ein solider Open World Titel, der auch in Koop ziemlich Spaß macht. Story, Waffen und teils Gameplay driften eher ins Abgedrehte und ist definitiv überzeichnet.
Bei der Suche nach einem realistischen Simulator also lieber von dannen ziehen. Bei der Suche nach verrückter Action mit Comedy, dann schon deutlich eher was für einen.
